name: Debtor (SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis Demo)
description:
This is the official port of Debtor for a 16-bit console - SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis. The demo has 7 levels. All menus and introductory video.

Other project - FoxyLand ® (SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis Demo)

Other project - Bio Evil ® (SEGA Mega Drive Tech Demo)

Donations will help develop the project.
